titles.title: A bill to amend the Carl Levin and Howard P. "Buck" McKeon National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015 to modify provisions relating to the conveyance of certain Federal land in Storey County, Nevada.
Storey County Land Conveyance Act
Storey County Land Conveyance Act
Storey County Land Conveyance Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Storey County Land Conveyance Act
This bill repeals the expedited program for the examination of unpatented mining claims within the mining townsites located in Virginia City in Storey County, Nevada, and provides for the conveyance and survey of additional federal land to be conveyed by the United States.
